info.title: Insecure Web App (IWA) API
info.description: This is the REST API for Insecure Web App (IWA) Pharmacy Direct. You can select a development or production server to test the API. Most operations require authentication via a user specific JWT token. To retrieve a JWT token for a user you can use the  '/authentication/sign-in' operation below and then copy the value of the 'accessToken' field. This value can then be entered when you click on the 'Authorize' button or lock icons.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keyword(s) search for orders to be found.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset of the starting record. 0 indicates the first record.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum records to return. The maximum value allowed is 50.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the order to be found. Cannot be empty.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the order to be updated. Cannot be empty.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: UUID of the order to be updated. Cannot be empty.
